backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor for the IoT energy dashboard that tracks footstep-generated energy, manages battery state transitions (charging/redirecting/depleting), stores up to 8760 hourly records, and exposes query/update methods for simulation control and hardware connection status.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that upgrades the actor state from an old schema to a new one by adding the `hardwareConnected` boolean field defaulting to false.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting the hardware waiting-state feature, listing the affected frontend files and confirming high-confidence implementation across DashboardLayout, HardwareWaitingState, and useQueries.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one-sentence summaries of all frontend source files, serving as a reference index for the project's component and hook structure.
frontend/index.css: Base Tailwind CSS entry file defining OKLCH CSS custom properties for light and dark theme color tokens used throughout the UI.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that mounts the React app into a root div and loads the main TypeScript module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that renders DashboardLayout as the sole page of the single-page application.
Card component displaying the current AI energy mode, a human-readable explanation, overcharge protection status, and a scrollable log of the last 10 timestamped decisions pulled from backend records.
Tabbed analytics card using Recharts to render hourly footstep bar charts, voltage line charts, and battery trend line charts from backend energy records.
Header component displaying the project title with neon amber styling, a banner background image with scanline overlay, and system-online/AI-active status badges.
Main dashboard layout component that conditionally renders either the full dashboard (SimulationControl, SensorDataPanel, AIDecisionPanel, EnergyFlowDiagram, AnalyticsCharts) or a HardwareWaitingState based on hardware connection status. Includes a header and footer with attribution.
frontend/src/components/EnergyFlowDiagra: SVG-based energy flow diagram that visualizes active energy paths (charging, redirecting, depleting) between footstep, generator, battery, and devices nodes using animated dashed arrows and color-coded edges derived from the latest sensor record.
frontend/src/components/HardwareWaitingS: Full-screen waiting state UI displayed when no hardware is connected, featuring pulsing rings, animated dots, and status text to indicate the system is online but awaiting an IoT device connection.
Displays live sensor data (footsteps, voltage, battery level, and operating mode) from the latest energy record using styled cards, a progress bar, and mode-specific color theming.
frontend/src/components/SimulationContro: Control bar for manually or automatically advancing the simulation, with a manual ADVANCE button and an AUTO toggle that triggers the advanceTime mutation every 4 seconds, also displaying the current record count.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and caches an ICP actor (authenticated or anonymous) using React Query, and invalidates/refetches dependent queries whenever the actor instance changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an InternetIdentityProvider and useInternetIdentity hook for managing ICP Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, identity persistence, and status tracking via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating backend data including energy records, footstep counts, current hour, hardware connection status, and AI energy mode adjustments.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet importing Orbitron, Share Tech Mono, and Inter fonts, setting up Tailwind layers, CSS custom properties for a dark neon theme, and utility classes for glow effects and animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider wrapping the root App component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the theme with custom neon colors, Orbitron/Share Tech Mono fonts, glow box shadows, and keyframe animations, with typography, container-queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing the Smart AI Footstep Electricity Generation dashboard, its architectural notes, implemented features, and versioning information.
